name: create_my_profile
description: Creates a new member profile and sets it as the current authenticated member.

vanityName.description: URL-friendly version of the member's name.

localized.description: Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name:
Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name:

person_data.description: Dictionary containing the new member's profile data with keys:

name: create_organization
description: Creates a new organization in the database.

localized.description: Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name, keys are locale codes in the format <language>_<COUNTRY>, for example:

preferredLocale.description: tells you which language/country version LinkedIn considers the "main" or "default" for that particular localized content.Dictionary with keys:

organization_data.description: Dictionary containing the new organization's data with keys:

name: create_organization_acl
description: Creates a new organization ACL record in the database.

roleAssignee.description: URN of the person to assign the role to (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1').

role.description: Role to assign to the person (one of 'ADMINISTRATOR', 'DIRECT_SPONSORED_CONTENT_POSTER', 'RECRUITING_POSTER', 'LEAD_CAPTURE_ADMINISTRATOR', 'LEAD_GEN_FORMS_MANAGER', 'ANALYST', 'CURATOR', 'CONTENT_ADMINISTRATOR').

state.description: Initial state of the ACL (one of 'ACTIVE', 'REQUESTED', 'REJECTED', 'REVOKED').

acl_data.description: Dictionary containing the new ACL record data with keys:

name: create_post
description: Creates a new post in the database.

author.description: URN of the post author (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1' or 'urn:li:organization:1').

visibility.description: Visibility setting of the post (one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', 'CONTAINER').

post_data.description: Dictionary containing the new post data with keys:

name: delete_my_profile
description: Deletes the authenticated member's profile from the database.

name: delete_organization_acl
description: Deletes an organization ACL record from the database.

acl_id.description: Unique identifier of the ACL record to delete.

name: delete_organization_by_id
description: Deletes an organization from the database by its ID.

organization_id.description: Unique identifier of the organization to delete.

name: delete_organization_by_vanity_name
description: Deletes organization(s) from the database by vanity name.

vanity_name.description: The organization's vanity name to delete.

name: delete_post_by_id
description: Deletes a post from the database.

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to delete.

name: find_posts_by_author
description: Searches for and lists posts based on the provided author identifier with pagination.

author.description: The identifier of the author (e.g., "urn:li:person:1" or "urn:li:organization:1") used to filter posts.

start.description: Starting index for pagination. Must be a non-negative integer. Defaults to 0.

count.description: Maximum number of posts to return. Must be a non-negative integer. Defaults to 10.

name: get_my_profile
description: Retrieves the authenticated member's profile data from the database.

projection.description:
Field projection syntax for controlling which fields to return.
The projection string should consist of comma-separated field names and may optionally
be enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to None.

name: get_organization_acls_by_role_assignee
description: Retrieves ACL records by roleAssignee URN with optional field projection and pagination. Retrieve information about the roles and permissions that a specific LinkedIn member (the "role assignee") has within one or more organizations on LinkedIn

role_assignee.description: URN of the person whose ACL records are requested.

projection.description:
Field projection syntax for controlling which fields to return.
The projection string should consist of comma-separated field names and may optionally
be enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to None.

start.description: Starting index for pagination. Defaults to 0.

count.description: Number of items to return. Defaults to 10.

name: get_organizations_by_vanity_name
description: Retrieves organization(s) by vanity name with optional field projection and pagination.

vanity_name.description: The organization's vanity name to search for.

projection.description:
Field projection syntax for controlling which fields to return.
The projection string should consist of comma-separated field names and may optionally
be enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to None.

start.description: Starting index for pagination. Defaults to 0.

count.description: Number of items to return. Defaults to 10.

name: get_post_by_id
description: Retrieves a post by its identifier with optional field projection.

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to retrieve.

projection.description:
Field projection syntax for controlling which fields to return.
The projection string should consist of comma-separated field names and may optionally
be enclosed in parentheses. Defaults to None.

start.description: Starting index for pagination. Defaults to 0. Must be non-negative.

count.description: Number of items to return. Defaults to 10. Must be positive.

name: update_my_profile
description: Updates the authenticated member's profile data in the database.

vanityName.description: URL-friendly version of the member's name.

localized.description: Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name:
Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name:

person_data.description: Dictionary containing the updated member profile data with keys:

name: update_organization_acl
description: Updates an existing organization ACL record in the database.

acl_id.description: Unique identifier of the ACL record to update.

roleAssignee.description: Updated URN of the person assigned the role (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1').

role.description: Updated role assigned to the person (one of 'ADMINISTRATOR', 'DIRECT_SPONSORED_CONTENT_POSTER', 'RECRUITING_POSTER', 'LEAD_CAPTURE_ADMINISTRATOR', 'LEAD_GEN_FORMS_MANAGER', 'ANALYST', 'CURATOR', 'CONTENT_ADMINISTRATOR').

state.description: Updated state of the ACL (one of 'ACTIVE', 'REQUESTED', 'REJECTED', 'REVOKED').

acl_data.description: Dictionary containing the updated ACL data with keys:

name: update_organization_by_id
description: Updates an existing organization's data in the database.

organization_id.description: Unique identifier of the organization to update.

localized.description: Dictionary with locale keys mapping to the localized name:

preferredLocale.description: tells you which language/country version LinkedIn considers the "main" or "default" for that particular localized content. Dictionary with keys:

name.description: Updated localized organization name with keys:

organization_data.description: Dictionary containing the updated organization data with keys:

name: update_post
description: Updates an existing post in the database.

post_id.description: Unique identifier of the post to update.

author.description: Updated URN of the post author (e.g., 'urn:li:person:1' or 'urn:li:organization:1').

visibility.description: Updated visibility setting of the post (one of 'PUBLIC', 'CONNECTIONS', 'LOGGED_IN', 'CONTAINER').

post_data.description: Dictionary containing the updated post data with keys:
